name: AstroBumper
description: Astro bumper is a game where the player needs to get the maximum number of items that are the fuel canisters. You can acquire other players' items by bumping into them, all their items will drop when Collision happens. The bump attack only will drop items when done to the sides since the bumpers protect the front side of the craft. The player with the most fuel canister when the time runs out will wins.
